text: janaya ekama samuhayak viya. pasuva ( matabheda hatagat vita) allah subharamci pavasannan lesa da avavada karannan lesa da nabivarun va eviya. tavada kavara deyak mata (janaya) matabheda æti kara gatte da e gæna janaya atara tindu kirima pinisa ovun samanga deva grantha da pahala kaleya. taman veta pæhædili sadhaka pæmini pasuva ovun atara tibu irsyava hetuven deva granthaya lat janaya hæra (venat kisivek) e gæna matabheda æti kara nogatha. pasuva satyayen yut kavara deyak tula ovun mata bheda æti kara gatte da e gæna allah tama anubhavayen visvasa kalavunata manga penviya. tavada allah taman abhimata karana ayata rju manga penvanneya
